name: Seler
appearance: Windburned cheeks, scarf threaded with signal colors, skiff-and-anchor tattoo behind the left ear.
character: Watchful with a dry wit; keeps her promises and her altitude.
talents: reads water from rooftops by ripples and smoke
flaws: keeps grudges long past their use
dreams: map clean air-lanes over the Scar
secrets: once accepted hush coin to ignore a fog-ferry, keeps the coin as penance
hides a moth-winged skiff's flight log from a forbidden sortie
